fields.description:
the apps work on the local simulators, and build for distribution with no errors. but crash consistently when tested by iTunes.
here are iTunes crash reports for 3 separate apps built and reviewed using the same codebase, with slightly different resources (graphics, custom variable settings)
- http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/b1/5e/32/b15e32fd-c7fa-9b19-ab09-20f9e370636f/temp..fnfzfgyc.crash
- http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/f9/95/b1/f995b144-56c4-3bb4-e794-7be7d613d40e/temp..dyqqfxch.crash

- http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/f5/84/23/f5842358-7603-e1be-bee3-f1d8ffe3f798/temp..eumvmncy.crash

- http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/3e/74/ae/3e74aea9-ba00-aa1e-4689-d98c38186116/temp..orofqsqg.crash
- http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/90/dc/70/90dc709e-1b69-af62-5b63-0a02d6a59524/temp..yfapebdo.crash

Since this effectively prevents us from submitting any iOS apps, it is critical to us.
thank you!
David
fields.summary: iOS: App crashes when tested by iTunes on iPhone 5 and iPad running iOS 6.0.1

comments.body:
Hi david,

There's not really much we can do without some narrowed down case, project or code.

Please can you try it on the latest SDKs (e.g. 3.1 GA) and let me know how it goes?

Thanks!
Closing ticket due to the information that was requested was not provided.
